[i][b]The acclaimed dramatisation of the life of Mohandas Mahatma Gandhi from his beginnings as a South African-educated lawyer through his historic galvanizing struggle to free India from British Colonial rule. With a large distinguished cast headlined by Ben Kingsley in a nuanced performance Sir Richard Attenboroughs biopic is a classic of the genre. Academy Award Nominations 11. Academy Awards 9 including Best Picture Best Director Best Actor--Ben Kingsley Best (Original) Screenplay.
[/b][/i]
